# Public lecture

Tuesday 10<sup>th</sup> of June at 16:30 there will be two lectures:

- **Giovanni Parmigiani**: *Concepts and Challenges in Replicability of Unsupervised Learning*
- **Branden Fitelson**: *A Philosopher Looks at the Replicability Crisis*.

The event is free and open to everyone but for organizational needs you can do the registration here [https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfUcMuZERIztTxNZKArZmezwNYBxOopukyJ11PlNcrjOpJYYw/viewform](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfUcMuZERIztTxNZKArZmezwNYBxOopukyJ11PlNcrjOpJYYw/viewform). **Students of the replicability school are already included**.
